cookingTips: Cube the brisket point into 1-inch pieces to maximize surface area for BBQ sauce absorption
Toss with broth and BBQ sauce in slow cooker and cook on low for 2-3 hours until sticky and caramelized
Toast buns lightly before serving to prevent sogginess
enrichment.coachingPrompt: This is Kansas City's signature sandwich featuring burnt, caramelized meat. How will you achieve that signature sticky, glazed texture?
